QuestData.Title: Report to Marshal Bluewall
QuestData.Description: Are you Marshal Bluewall's new recruits? Of course you are.$b$bWhat are you waiting for? Good soldiers are dying in the desert. Aren't you excited to join them?$b$bNow, get going and don't dry out on the way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Marshal Bluewall at the Alliance encampment near Hive'Zora.
QuestData.RewardText: The Alliance needs every able body they can get. The Horde has been receiving a steady supply of reinforcements from the northern part of the continent, and it's been a struggle to keep up.$b$bLet me explain the situation to you.
